name: Consumer Council for Water
goal:
The Consumer Council for Water is a non-departmental public body sponsored by Defra and the Welsh Government to represent the interests of water and sewerage customers in England and Wales.

Our remit is to make sure the consumers' voices are heard and acted upon in the water debates across England, Wales and Europe.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: Environmental Directives that might have an impact on water bills of water and sewerage customers in England and Wales.
